title: Home | NATRUE
description: Our mission is to protect and promote natural and organic cosmetics to the benefit of consumers worldwide.
cleaned_text: PRINCIPLES FOR NATURAL, SUSTAINABLE PRODUCTS Key principles of NATRUE +6700 certified products +280 brands +2700 certified & approved raw materials +70 members worldwide NATRUE stands for a future without greenwashing NATRUE stands for a future without greenwashing True Stories Do you want to know more about the NATRUE Members and Label Users?
